mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunName
select dongCode, dongName from dongcode where left(dongCode,5) = #{gugun} and dongName is not null order by dongName
select aptCode, buildYear, apartmentName, lng,lat, dongCode from houseinfo where dongCode = #{regCode} order by apartmentName
mapper.insert: insert into inter_area(userId, dongCode,dongName) values(#{userId},#{dongCode}, (select concat(sidoName, " ", IFNULL(gugunname,"")," ",IFNULL(dongName,'')) from dongcode where dongCode = #{dongCode}) )
mapper.select: select count(*) from inter_area where userId = #{userId} and dongCode = #{dongCode}
mapper.delete: delete from inter_area where userId = #{userId} and dongCode = #{dongCode}
mapper.select: select name, lat,lng, st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat)) as dist from starbucks where st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat))<=1000 order by dist limit 1
select name, lat,lng, st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat)) as dist from metro where st_distance_sphere(point(#{lng},#{lat}),point(lng,lat))<=1000 order by dist limit 1
